DOC.brief_title: Fetoscopic Selective Laser Photocoagulation Twin-Twin Transfusion Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: We hypothesize treatment underlie chorioangiopagus selective fetoscopic laser photocoagulation improve survival twin reduce incidence neurologic , cardiac , developmental sequelae twin-twin transfusion syndrome ( TTTS ) . We propose test hypothesis prospective randomize multicenter trial compare serial amnioreduction selective fetoscopic laser photocoagulation case severe ( stage II-IV ) twin-twin transfusion syndrome ( TTTS ) . Primary Outcomes : Survival donor twin 30 day birth treatment failure ; Survival recipient twin 30 day birth treatment failure ; Secondary Outcomes : Survival time twin utero birth ( may censor 30 day birth ) ; Gestational age delivery ; Placental insufficiency ; Cardiac outcome : echocardiographic evidence cardiac compromise ; Neurologic outcome : evidence brain injury precede birth MRI ; Postnatal comorbidity
